description.p: DreamChess is an open source chess game. It comes with its own engine called Dreamer. Both DreamChess and Dreamer are compatible with the xboard/Winboard chess engine communication protocol. This means that DreamChess can be used with other xboard-compatible chess engines such as crafty and GNU Chess. Similarly, the Dreamer chess engine can be used with other xboard-compatible user interfaces such as XBoard/WinBoard.
